t: A psalm of the sons of Korah. A song.
The*pn city he founded is on the holy mountains.
The*ln Lord*s loves Zion’s city gates more*ln than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Glorious*ln things are said about you, city*ln of God. Selah*ig
“I*pn will make a record of those who know me: Rahab,*ln Babylon, Philistia, Tyre, and Cush — each*ln one was born there.”
And*ln it will be said of Zion, “This*ln one and that one were born in her.” The*ln Most High himself will establish her.
When*ln he registers the peoples, the*ln Lord*s will record, “This*ln one was born there.” Selah*ig
Singers*ln and dancers alike will say, “My*ln whole source of joy is in you.”
